subject: Shipping from china?
description_text:
Hello,

You said to me that you are shipping it from germany ?

conversations.body_text: Hi Ebu Tosun,    We apologize for the inconvenience. Our German warehouse inventory has been depleted, so we will ship from China. There will be no customs duties incurred. Should any duties arise, we will reimburse you in full.

Approximately when will the package arrive?





service@simsonn.com
Hi Ebu Tosun,    Shipment from the German warehouse is expected to arrive around the 15th. UPS shipment is expected to arrive around the 7th.

There will be two packages?

service@simsonn.com
Hi Ebu Tosun,    All of these are in one package.
